Package de.wwu.jmrigreenfootinterface.net

Class WebSocketClient

java.lang.Object
de.wwu.jmrigreenfootinterface.net.WebSocketClient
public class WebSocketClient
extends Object
A client for communication with the JMRI WebServer
Author:
Leonard Bienbeck

    • host

      private String host

    • port

      private String port

  • Constructor Details

    • WebSocketClient

      public WebSocketClient​(String host, String port)
      Creates an instance of the client with given host and port of the JMRI WebServer
      Parameters:
      host - The host of the JMRI WebServer
      port - The Port of the JMRI WebServer

  • Method Details

    • connect

      private HttpURLConnection connect​(String endpoint) throws IOException
      Creates an HttpURLConnection to the given JSON endpoint of the JMRI WebServer
      Parameters:
      endpoint - The endpoint
      Returns:
      The created HttpURLConnection
      Throws:
      IOException - If something goes wrong

    • doRequest

      public String doRequest​(String requestMethod, String endpoint, String message) throws IOException
      Sends a request to the JMRI WebServer. This will use the given HTTP request method and the given endpoint to establish the connection to. The given message is sent as Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8.
      Parameters:
      requestMethod - The HTTP request method, e.g. PUT, POST or GET
      endpoint - The given endpoint, e.g. some type supported by JMRI
      message - The JSON message
      Returns:
      The server's response
      Throws:
      IOException - If something goes wrong
